articles.author: Sarah Kaplan
articles.title: Tennessee floods show a pressing climate danger across America: 'Walls of water' - The Washington Post
articles.description: Climate change will bring more deadly waves of water to the United States. Here’s what the country needs to do to be prepared.
articles.content:
An ocean did come through, Rice said.
Tennessees flash floods underscore the peril climate change poses even in inland areas, where people once thought themselves immune. A warmer atmosphere that ho… [+8117 chars]

articles.title: New Honda Integra to be developed in Japan, won't be electric - NZ Autocar
articles.description: With one single image and one line of teaser text, Honda’s American arm Acura recently confirmed the return of the Integra nameplate after a lengthy hiatus; to the fanfare of Japanese car fans around the world.

articles.title: Don’t Miss: Rare Seasonal “Blue Moon” Rises Tonight - SciTechDaily
articles.description: This month we’ll get to see a Full Moon on August 22, 2021, known by some early Native American tribes of the northeastern United States, as the Sturgeon Moon. The name was given to the Moon because the large sturgeon fish of the Great Lakes, and other major …
